name: Mystery Manor[WIP]
description:
You step out of the carriage  and enter the manor and are greeted to a party.  But soon trouble stirs. Are you able to solve the mysteries of Mystery Manor?

Only some of the first part is in it. Originally a submission for the  I can't write but I want to tell a story jam. Hopeful you'll enjoy it so I can add more gameplay to it.  Also the cover image looks somewhat like the house, sorry I'm just really bad at drawing. :(
